fun.connor.lighter.response

Class Responses

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.response.Responses

  • public final class Responses
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for building common HTTP response types.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Response<java.lang.Void> accepted()
      Create a response with no body and status 202 - ACCEPTED.

      • redirect

        public static Response<java.lang.Void> redirect(int status,
                                                java.lang.String url)
        Create a redirect response to redirect browsers or other clients. This response has no body. If provided status is not a 3xx redirect code, this method throws an IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        status - a valid redirect status code
        url - the url to redirect to
        Returns:
        the response

      • noContent

        public static <T> Response<T> noContent(int status)
        Return a response with no content but with a content type. This is useful when some conditions of an endpoint method return a response with content and some do not.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the response body
        Parameters:
        status - the response status
        Returns:
        a new response
